'''Core''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
*{{BlockLink|Heavy Core}}, a block obtained from vaults

*{{BlockLink|Nether Reactor Core}}, an unused block in {{BE}}, previously used as a replacement for the [[nether portal]] in [[Pocket Edition]]
*{{ItemLink|Heart of the Sea|Nautilus Core}}, an unused name for the [[heart of the sea]]

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
*{{LeMiscLink|Blast Tower Core}}, a [[MCL:Resource|resource]] used to build [[MCL:Blast Tower|blast towers]]
*{{LeMiscLink|Frost Tower Core}}, a resource used to build [[MCL:Frost Tower|frost towers]]
*{{LeMiscLink|Stun Tower Core}}, a resource used to build [[MCL:Stun Tower|stun towers]]
